16283.<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>「こ:

16284.<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>「ほ:
Only a decade or so ago, there was a growing movement here in Gartlant to restore the Ogre's original, hard-
edged way of life.

16285.<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>「そ:
At the center of it all was my son Deltanis and his close friend Zexen, who was also the head soldier at the
time.

16286.<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>「ふ:
They gathered like-minded companions and formed an organization called the Sword of Gazbalan, and worked day and
night in rigorous training.

16287.<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>「だ:
<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>But they were too pure. Their practice
escalated and became extremely
dangerous.<stop_lip_animation n00129 CLOSE_MOUTH>

16288.<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>「わ:

wouldn't listen. And then it happened.<stop_lip_animation n00129 CLOSE_MOUTH>

16289.<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>「デ:
It was a tragic accident in which several young men, including Deltanis, lost their lives in an extreme
practice.

16290.<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>「わ:
I immediately disbanded the Sword of Gazbalan and issued an order forbidding any further dangerous
practices in this country, and I had to issue it.

16291.<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>「従:
They even imposed harsh punishments on those who disobeyed them. Zexen and many other members of the Sword of
Gazbalan were exiled from the country.

16292.<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>「も:
<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>If only I had been able to stop their
rampage earlier. That is the only
regret I have even now.<stop_lip_animation n00129 CLOSE_MOUTH>

16293.<start_lip_sync n00129 _normal m00001>「遺:
